peridot

Class Operations

  • java.lang.Object
    • peridot.Operations

  • public class Operations
extends java.lang.Object
    Main operations for R-Peridot. This class is supposed to be used by the CLI and the GUI, as a common high-level interface for both. Created by pentalpha on 20/02/2018.
